parameters.name: P0
parameters.description: Pointer to an array of 3 doubles (x,y,z), dimension point

parameters.name: P1
parameters.description: Pointer to an array of 3 doubles (x,y,z), dimension end

parameters.name: P2
parameters.description: Pointer to an array of 3 doubles (x,y,z), normal to the plane of sketch

parameters.name: P3
parameters.description: Pointer to an array of 3 doubles (x,y,z), extension line 1 reference point

parameters.name: P4
parameters.description: Pointer to an array of 3 doubles (x,y,z), extension line 2 reference point

parameters.name: TextPoint
parameters.description: Pointer to an array of 3 doubles (x,y,z), position of text

parameters.name: Val
parameters.description: Value for the non-associative linear dimension

parameters.name: Angle
parameters.description: Inclination angle of the text in radians

parameters.name: P0
parameters.description: Pointer to an array of 3 doubles (x,y,z), dimension point

parameters.name: P1
parameters.description: Pointer to an array of 3 doubles (x,y,z), dimension end

parameters.name: P2
parameters.description: Pointer to an array of 3 doubles (x,y,z), normal to the plane of sketch

parameters.name: P3
parameters.description: Pointer to an array of 3 doubles (x,y,z), extension line 1 reference point

parameters.name: P4
parameters.description: Pointer to an array of 3 doubles (x,y,z), extension line 2 reference point

parameters.name: TextPoint
parameters.description: Pointer to an array of 3 doubles (x,y,z), position of text

parameters.name: Val
parameters.description: Value for the non-associative linear dimension

parameters.name: Angle
parameters.description: Inclination angle of the text in radians

remarks: SOLIDWORKS creates this type of dimension between the two points you specify. It has no relation to your geometry.
